item.title: Critique of Dr Carrie Madej & Tania the Herbalist
item.description: Here is my personal critique after listening to this video Original article Dr Carrie Madej & Tania the Herbalist - YouTube Claims Part of us can be owned by whoever owns the patent of the covid vaccine Ridiculous. The claim is that if it’s actually taken up into the genome and it’s permanent then part of us can be owned by the patent. This is lunacy and very unrealistic that this would ever occur.
